calcBounceApex(double) - Static method in class bounce.logic.Physics
Calculates the maximum height of a bounce using acceleration, and initial and final velocities.
calcDisplacement(Physics.Direction, double, double) - Static method in class bounce.logic.Physics
Calculates the total displacement that an object should have moved based on the specified time and velocity.
calcTimeToApex(double, double) - Static method in class bounce.logic.Physics
Calculates the time in seconds needed for an object to reach an apex of a specified height.
calcVelocity(double) - Static method in class bounce.logic.Physics
Calculates the velocity of an object that has fallen from a specified height.
changeMaterial(Material) - Method in class bounce.gui.BounceDisplay
Changes the material of the ball.

Manages the communication between various GUI and logic components.
